titleStmt.title: The Greeks and Trojans wars ... Tune is, A conscionable caviat.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. VeWright [sic], and L. Clark,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing, which has publication date = [1674-9].
Verse - "Of Greece and Troy I shall you tell,".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
